q1.question: Can I keep my existing phone number?
q1.answer: Yes, absolutely! You simply set up call forwarding from your current number to our AI number. Your customers still call your familiar number.

q2.question: How does the free trial work?
q2.answer: You get 7 days of free access to all features of your chosen package. No credit card needed at signup. After the trial, you can choose whether to continue.

q3.question: Can I switch plans later?
q3.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately. Downgrades take effect at the end of your current billing period.

q4.question: What happens if I exceed my conversation limit?
q4.answer: We'll notify you when you reach 80% of your limit. If you exceed it, you can upgrade or conversations continue at €0.15 each. The service keeps working.

q5.question: Is there a contract?
q5.answer: No contract. You can cancel anytime with no fees. With monthly billing, the service stops at the end of your paid period.

q6.question: What languages does the AI speak?
q6.answer: Currently Dutch and English. The AI automatically detects the customer's language and responds in the same language. More languages coming soon.
